rukus.text: He bastraabrta
utha, arau satarka karaa
arau tomara pratipalakara sraesthatba ghosana karaa
Arau tomara pochaka-paraicchada paraitra karaa
arau aparaitrata (sbirka) paraihara karaa
arau adhika poraara asata kako anugraha nakaraiba
Arau tomara pratipalakara babe'i dhairya dharana karaa
Eteke yetiya sinata phum diya ha’ba
se'i dinato ha’ba eta sankatara dina
yito kaphirasakalara babe sahaja nahaya
Yaka ma'i akalasaraiyakai srsti karaicho taka mora hatata erai diya
Arau yaka ma'i pradana karaicho bipula dhana-sampada
arau (pradana karaicho) nityasangi putrabora
Arau taka pradana karaicho sbacchanda jiranara pracura upakarana
tathapi'o si kamana karae ye, ma'i taka arau adhika di'om
ketiya'o nahaya, si amara nidarsanasamuhara biraud'dhacarai
Anatipalame ma'i taka (jahannamara picala silata) araohana karaibalai badhya karaama
Niscaya si cinta karaile arau sid'dhanta grahana karaile
Eteke si dhbansa ha'oka! Kenekai si (e'i) sid'dhanta grahana karaile
akau si dhbansa ha'oka! Kenekai si (e'i) sid'dhanta grahana karaile
tara pichata si laksya karaile
Tara pichata si bhraum koca khoraale arau mukha bikrta karaile
Tara pichata si ubhatile arau ahankara karaile
Tara pichata si ka’le, ‘eya purbarae paraa cali aha yadura bahirae ana eko nahaya’
‘eyato manuharae'i katha’
Anatipalame ma'i taka chakbarata (jahannamata) praraesa karaama
Arau kihe tomaka janaba chakbara ki
i eko arasista naraakhiba arau erai'o nidiba
I sarairara chala jbala'i ka'la karai diba
Chakbarara tattbaradhanata ache unaisajana (praharai)

Arau ami kerala phiraistasakalake'i jahannamara tattbaradhayaka bana'icho; arau kaphirasakalara paraiksasbaraupa ami sihamtara sankhya nirdharana karaicho yate kitabapraaptasakale drrha bisbasa karae, arau muminasakalara imana brd'dhi paya arau yate kitabapraaptasakale arau muminasakale sandeha posana nakarae; arau yate iyara phalata yihamtara antarata byadhi ache sihamte arau kaphirasakale kaya, allahe e'i (sankhyara) udaharana di ki bujaba bicaraiche? Enekai allahe yaka iccha pathabhrasta karae arau yaka iccha take'i hidayata pradana karae; arau tomara pratipalakara sain'yabahini samparke te'omra bahirae ana konorae najane; arau jahannamara e'i udaharana manuhara babe eta upadesa matra
